commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, we've been coming to see the theater club's play every day, but are you sure about this?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Don't like plays, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, it's not that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: For Shizuko, wouldn't it be better to like, go right to her classroom during break times, or something?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Uwah... *Sniff*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ahh! D-Don't cry! I'm sorry, I was too harsh!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shizuku Osaka's acting is amazing.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No matter how many times I watch it, this scene always makes me cry. She just sucks you onto the stage.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: O-Oh... You scared me there, I thought I'd made you cry!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sorry, sorry.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shizuko wanted to do theater from the start. She even said she wanted to put her school idol activities to use in her plays.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So that's why she's this good at acting.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's not really what I'm getting at. I mean to say that being a school idol isn't the only thing she's after!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But she'd said she'd bet her high school life on being an idol. *Sniff*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ahh, Kasumi, don't cry!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I'm not crying, you're...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry for the wait, you two. I got Shizuku to come over.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: U-Um, pleased to meet you. My name is Shizuku Osaka.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry to drag you over here, I know you're tired.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No, that's fine. Kasumi, it really...has been a while, hasn't it? I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shizuku, your acting was amazing! I cry no matter how many times I see you up there!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thank you very much. I'm...really moved that you've come to see us so many times.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shizuko, why'd you stop coming to the club?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: K-Kasumi, that's a little...!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No, it's all right.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's really something I should have told her about.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well... I've always loved theater, but I wanted to be a school idol just as much.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So I transferred to this school, since I knew this was the time in my life where I could focus on being an idol.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I knew that Nijigasaki High School was strongly promoting their idols, and figured I could really put some work in these 3 years.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then, why? Kasumi told me a bit about it, but were the differences in direction really that painful?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It wasn't that. I thought it was really interesting how we all wanted to do different things.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I wanted to put my idol experience to use in acting, and it was fun to see the differences in what everyone sought and how they expressed themselves.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But Setsuna definitely stood out. I thought that if I followed her, I would get closer to my school idol ideal.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But something went wrong?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Setsuna definitely led us down the right path, but I could never express what I wanted to do well.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That got me frustrated with myself...and I wanted to become expressive enough that Setsuna could pick up on my feelings, so I started training here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-Then say that! You know how worried I was?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I had my plate really full. I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So you mean you were a guest performer in theater club so you could be a better school idol?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I knew you'd still have your school idol passion!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I transferred so I could be a school idol. That passion isn't going away that easily.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Then come back! The club's in danger!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wait, what?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The student council president said it'll be disbanded if something doesn't change.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, no... It's because I went off on my own, isn't it? I'm really sorry!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You'll come back?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If you'll let me! I've managed to pick up just a little confidence, and I want everyone to see me perform.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, we'd love to have you back! Isn't that right, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Aw, that's great, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-It's great and all, but I'm still a little mad!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But, well, you're the same year as me, and I'd really miss you, so...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi! Thank you so much!

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: My, what a coincidence.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: President?!

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: I'd come to check up on the theater club and happened to run into you.

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: Is recruitment going well?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It sure is! Powered-up Shizuko's agreed to return to the club!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: If we keep this up, we're going to get ten members in a flash, just you wait!

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: *Giggle* Well, I'm looking forward to that. Take care.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...You know, she really isn't my favorite person. Hmph.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, let her go. We've got to focus on recruiting those members! Let's get to it!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
